name: spinner
title: Spinner
description: The Spinner component expands the shadcn spinner component with additional variants.

files.content:
<script lang="ts">
    import Bars from "./spinners/bars.svelte";
    import CircleFilled from "./spinners/circle-filled.svelte";
    import Ellipsis from "./spinners/ellipsis.svelte";
    import Infinite from "./spinners/infinite.svelte";
    import Pinwheel from "./spinners/pinwheel.svelte";
    import Ring from "./spinners/ring.svelte";
    import Throbber from "./spinners/throbber.svelte";

    import { Spinner as ShadcnSpinner } from "$lib/components/ui/spinner";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
    import type { SpinnerProps } from "./types";

    let {
        variant,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerProps = $props();
</script>

{#if variant == "throbber"}
    <Throbber {...restProps} />
{:else if variant == "pinwheel"}
    <Pinwheel {...restProps} />
{:else if variant == "circle-filled"}
    <CircleFilled {...restProps} />
{:else if variant == "ellipsis"}
    <Ellipsis {...restProps} />
{:else if variant =="ring"}
    <Ring {...restProps} />
{:else if variant == "bars"}
    <Bars {...restProps} />
{:else if variant == "infinite"}
    <Infinite {...restProps} />
{:else} <!-- Default -->
    <ShadcnSpinner
        class={cn("size-6", restProps.className)}
        {...restProps}
    />
{/if}

<script lang="ts">
    import type { SpinnerVariantProps } from "../types";

    let {
        size = 24,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerVariantProps = $props();
</script>

<svg
    height={size}
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    width={size}
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    {...restProps}
>
    <title>Loading...</title>
    <style>
        .spinner-bar {
            animation: spinner-bars-animation .8s linear infinite;
            animation-delay: -.8s;
        }
        .spinner-bars-2 {
            animation-delay: -.65s;
        }
        .spinner-bars-3 {
            animation-delay: -0.5s;
        }
        @keyframes spinner-bars-animation {
            0% {
                y: 1px;
                height: 22px;
            }
            93.75% {
                y: 5px;
                height: 14px;
                opacity: 0.2;
            }
        }
    </style>
    <rect
        class="spinner-bar"
        fill="currentColor"
        height="22"
        width="6"
        x="1"
        y="1"
    />
    <rect
        class="spinner-bar spinner-bars-2"
        fill="currentColor"
        height="22"
        width="6"
        x="9"
        y="1"
    />
    <rect
        class="spinner-bar spinner-bars-3"
        fill="currentColor"
        height="22"
        width="6"
        x="17"
        y="1"
    />
</svg>

<script lang="ts">
    import type { SpinnerVariantProps } from "../types";

    let {
        size = 24,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerVariantProps = $props();
</script>

<svg
    height={size}
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    width={size}
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    {...restProps}
>
    <title>Loading...</title>
    <circle cx="4" cy="12" fill="currentColor" r="2">
        <animate
            attributeName="cy"
            begin="0;ellipsis3.end+0.25s"
            calcMode="spline"
            dur="0.6s"
            id="ellipsis1"
            keySplines=".33,.66,.66,1;.33,0,.66,.33"
            values="12;6;12"
        />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="12" cy="12" fill="currentColor" r="2">
        <animate
            attributeName="cy"
            begin="ellipsis1.begin+0.1s"
            calcMode="spline"
            dur="0.6s"
            keySplines=".33,.66,.66,1;.33,0,.66,.33"
            values="12;6;12"
        />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="20" cy="12" fill="currentColor" r="2">
        <animate
            attributeName="cy"
            begin="ellipsis1.begin+0.2s"
            calcMode="spline"
            dur="0.6s"
            id="ellipsis3"
            keySplines=".33,.66,.66,1;.33,0,.66,.33"
            values="12;6;12"
        />
    </circle>
</svg>

<script lang="ts">
    import type { SpinnerVariantProps } from "../types";

    let {
        size = 24,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerVariantProps = $props();
</script>

<svg
    height={size}
    preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid"
    viewBox="0 0 100 100"
    width={size}
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    {...restProps}
>
    <title>Loading...</title>
    <path
        d="M24.3 30C11.4 30 5 43.3 5 50s6.4 20 19.3 20c19.3 0 32.1-40 51.4-40 C88.6 30 95 43.3 95 50s-6.4 20-19.3 20C56.4 70 43.6 30 24.3 30z"
        fill="none"
        stroke="currentColor"
        stroke-dasharray="205.271142578125 51.317785644531256"
        stroke-linecap="round"
        stroke-width="10"
        style="transform: scale(0.8); transform-origin: 50px 50px;"
    >
        <animate
            attributeName="stroke-dashoffset"
            dur="2s"
            keyTimes="0;1"
            repeatCount="indefinite"
            values="0;256.58892822265625"
        />
    </path>
</svg>

<script lang="ts">
    import type { SpinnerVariantProps } from "../types";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
    import { LoaderPinwheel } from "@lucide/svelte";

    let {
        class: className,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerVariantProps = $props();
</script>

<LoaderPinwheel
    class={cn("animate-spin", className)} 
    {...restProps}
/>

<script lang="ts">
    import type { SpinnerVariantProps } from "../types";

    let {
        size = 24,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerVariantProps = $props();
</script>

<svg
    height={size}
    stroke="currentColor"
    viewBox="0 0 44 44"
    width={size}
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    {...restProps}
>
    <title>Loading...</title>
    <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke-width="2">
        <circle cx="22" cy="22" r="1">
            <animate
                attributeName="r"
                begin="0s"
                calcMode="spline"
                dur="1.8s"
                keySplines="0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1"
                keyTimes="0; 1"
                repeatCount="indefinite"
                values="1; 20"
            />
            <animate
                attributeName="stroke-opacity"
                begin="0s"
                calcMode="spline"
                dur="1.8s"
                keySplines="0.3, 0.61, 0.355, 1"
                keyTimes="0; 1"
                repeatCount="indefinite"
                values="1; 0"
            />
        </circle>
        <circle cx="22" cy="22" r="1">
            <animate
                attributeName="r"
                begin="-0.9s"
                calcMode="spline"
                dur="1.8s"
                keySplines="0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1"
                keyTimes="0; 1"
                repeatCount="indefinite"
                values="1; 20"
            />
            <animate
                attributeName="stroke-opacity"
                begin="-0.9s"
                calcMode="spline"
                dur="1.8s"
                keySplines="0.3, 0.61, 0.355, 1"
                keyTimes="0; 1"
                repeatCount="indefinite"
                values="1; 0"
            />
        </circle>
    </g>
</svg>

<script lang="ts">
    import type { SpinnerVariantProps } from "../types";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
    import { Loader } from "@lucide/svelte";

    let {
        class: className,
        ...restProps
    }: SpinnerVariantProps = $props();
</script>

<Loader 
    class={cn("animate-spin", className)} 
    {...restProps}
/>
